statements: SELECT * FROM mathematics_class WHERE teacher_id = 1
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM mathematics_class WHERE teacher_id = 2 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT teacher_id, COUNT(student_id) as total_students FROM mathematics_class GROUP BY teacher_id
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM mathematics_class
SELECT teacher_id, AVG(grade) as avg_grade FROM mathematics_class GROUP BY teacher_id HAVING avg_grade > 80
SELECT * FROM mathematics_class WHERE teacher_id = 1 AND course_id = 101
SELECT student_id, grade, course_id FROM mathematics_class WHERE teacher_id = 2 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, AVG(grade) as average_grade FROM mathematics_class GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 80 ORDER BY average_grade DESC
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) as average_grade FROM mathematics_class GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 3 ORDER BY average_grade DESC
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) as num_students FROM mathematics_class GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_students DESC
SELECT * FROM Teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;
SELECT course_name FROM Courses WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM Teachers JOIN Courses ON Teachers.teacher_id = Courses.teacher_id;
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_id FROM Teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, Teachers.teacher_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 3 OR course_id = 4;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id WHERE teacher_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM Teachers;
SELECT teacher_name, course_id FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM Teachers
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule FROM Courses WHERE teacher_id = 1
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE schedule LIKE '%AM%'
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM Courses INNER JOIN Teachers ON Courses.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, schedule_day FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Teachers WHERE teaching_subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM Courses WHERE schedule_day = 'Monday';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, schedule_day, start_time, end_time FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name, teaching_subject FROM Courses c INNER JOIN Teachers t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, course_name FROM Students s INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id INNER JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';

SELECT course_name, teacher_name, student_name, student_grade FROM Courses c INNER JOIN Teachers t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id INNER JOIN Students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM courses JOIN teachers ON courses.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM enrollments JOIN grades ON enrollments.student_id = grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments USING (student_id) JOIN courses USING (course_id);
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE department = 'Mathematics';
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM courses INNER JOIN teachers ON courses.teacher_id = teachers.teacher_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, course_name FROM grades INNER JOIN enrollments ON grades.enrollment_id = enrollments.student_id, enrollments.course_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN grades ON enrollments.student_id = grades.enrollment_id WHERE grade >= 90;
